availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Van Dyke (spencer county farmer)

body.p: Spencer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Mary A. Van Dyke. Father of William Van Dyke, Mary Van Dyke, and Loo E. Van Dyke. Farmer in Spencer County in 1860. Owned four enslaved people in Spencer County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District No. 2, p. 2; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, Division No. 2, p. 1.
